snippet: A 28-year-old gunman shot and wounded a security guard in the lobby of the Family Research Council, a conservative Christian organization, the F.B.I. said.
abstract: Gunman Floyd L Corkins II shoots and wounds a security officer while trying to enter the Washington, DC, headquarters of the Family Research Council, which advocates socially conservative and Christian causes.
lead_paragraph: A 28-year-old gunman shot and wounded a security guard in the lobby of the Family Research Council, a conservative Christian organization, the F.B.I. said.

headline.seo: Shooting at Family Research Council in Washington
headline.main: Shooting at Family Research Council in Washington
headline.print_headline: Policy Group In Washington Is Shooting Site
